text: Ezɨ Gideon ghuava otogha moga gara orazima, gumazir mam kamaghɨn uan irebamɨn gun uan namakam geghari, “Kɨ irebamɨn garima, me balin ovɨziba isa balin bretɨn mamɨn ingari, ezɨ bretɨn kam uabɨ poghpogha iza, e Midiania itir danganir kamɨn aven iza averpenim pamten a mɨsoghezɨ a ragha ghua nguazim girɨ.”
